name: Jumpluff
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.

poke_body.name: Cotton Spore
poke_body.effect: Whenever Jumpluff would be damaged by your opponent’s attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Jumpluff by that attack.

attacks.name: Cottonweed Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. For each heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
